venue.phone: Please Send Me A Message on Meet
venue.name: Davis Square

item.description:
The 5th annual Marathon Sports "Somerville Jingle Bell Run" is a blast and is enjoyed by friends, co-workers and families.....huge packs of friendly folks attend wearing holiday costumes...the post race time is at all of the area pubs and sponsored by Harpoon Brewery is as good a Christmas celebration out there as there is...many of the pubs supporting local love music!

What: 5th Annual Marathon Sports Somerville Jingle Bell Run 5K road race (RUN & WALK)

Where: Davis Square, Somerville

When: Sunday, December 18th 11am  (meeting by 9am in Braintree)

Cost: $32

***THIS WILL SELL OUT EARLY!***

TO REGISTER: http://baevents.com/jinglebell for online (active.com) or Mail-in registration

(as of 11/7, close to 75% full)

 POST RACE PARTY!
Chipped timing for start and finish

 **Finisher Medal with bottle opener!! See picture! 

Early # pickup is available- may be an option for the group who rsvp’s
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in Braintree and carpool together, details to follow.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 5th Annual Somervill Jingle Bell Run
